problem.title: The Problem We're Solving
problem.subtitle: Urinary tract infections represent one of the most common and dangerous complications in catheterized patients, with devastating consequences for patient outcomes.
problem.description: Urinary tract infections are one of the most common and dangerous complications in catheterized patients. They often go undetected until symptoms worsen, leading to prolonged hospital stays, systemic infections, or worse.
solution.title: Our Revolutionary Solution
solution.subtitle: Wonder Guard leverages cutting-edge biosensor technology to provide real-time monitoring and early detection of urinary tract infections.
solution.description: Wonder Guard uses biosensor technology to monitor biomarkers in real-time, embedded directly into urinary catheter bags. When early signs of infection are detected, it notifies care providers before symptoms escalate.
evidence.title: Clinical Evidence & Validation
evidence.subtitle: Wonder Guard's platform has been rigorously tested and validated against known UTI markers, with ongoing studies paving the way toward full clinical deployment.
evidence.description: Wonder Guard's platform has been tested in simulated environments and validated against known UTI markers. Ongoing studies are paving the way toward full clinical deployment and regulatory approval.
